page.title: 05 Services-Activities
page.content:
Education
ATTLEBOROUGH High School(706 Pupils) " Middle School(242 Pupils) " First School(303 Pupils) Chapel Rd school for the mentally handicapped and Adult Training Centre, Pre school playgroups(3),Mothers and Toddlers club. Some Medical Services Available General practitioners,group practice (6 doctors),community midwifery sister(2),community sisters(4), dentists(3)+school dentist,opticians, chemists,chiropodist ,veterinary surgeons,Alcoholics Anomymous, volunteer ambulance,hospitals(Wayland and Norfolk & Norwich),physiotherapist ,health visitors(2),baby clinic.
